recipe.title: Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; strawberry, stems removed, chopped ; (75 g)
4 ; graham crackers, additional crackers for topping if desired

steps.step: In a large bowl, add the cream and condensed milk, then whip until soft peaks form.
Add the cream cheese, strawberries, and strawberry jam, and mix thoroughly.
Gently fold the crackers into the mixture, then transfer to baking pan (top with crackers if desired).

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large bowl, add the cream and condensed milk, then whip until soft peaks form.
Add the cream cheese, strawberries, and strawberry jam, and mix thoroughly.
Gently fold the crackers into the mixture, then transfer to baking pan (top with crackers if desired).
